description.value: After stunning an opponent, you infuse them with elemental energy. Burning through their nerves, freezing their blood, shocking their system. Even when they recover, the energy lingers.

system.benefits:
When you successfully Stun an opponent with Stunning Strike, you can spend an additional 2 Energy to infuse them with elemental energy:

  • Choose one element you have Pneuma Strike for
  • Target immediately takes [[/damage 2d8 type=elemental]] damage (no weaving check, ignores DR)
  • Energy courses through their paralyzed form
  • If Stunned condition ends early: Target takes additional [[/damage 1d8 type=elemental]] damage as residual energy releases
